updates.HtmlString: You can now get a foil legendary creature. Thanks, Dan!
Updated marketing cards to be more accurate for set, plus set chances as 1:3 token:marketing for core sets, 2:3 for expansions, and 9:1 as of Battle for Zendikar.
Updated foil chances. Now 15/67 chance a booster has a foil and includes basic lands.

updates.htmlString: Evening: Now legendary creatures replace a single uncommon or rare slot.
Morning: Now legendary slots only produce legendary creatures instead of all legendary types.
Morning: Removed 'Teferi, Timebender' from boosters. Removed promos from in-booster Lengendaries.
Evening: Removed all Planeswalker deck cards.
Evening: Firesong and Sunspeaker no longer available in boosters. Every boosters now contains a Legendary.
